name: Seedit
description: A GUI for plebbit similar to old.reddit
author: Plebbit Labs

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PUBLIC_URL=./ GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false vite build
scripts.build-netlify: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max_old_space_size=4096" NODE_ENV=production PUBLIC_URL=./ GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true VITE_COMMIT_REF=$COMMIT_REF CI='' vite build
scripts.analyze-bundle: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PUBLIC_URL=./ GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true vite build && npx source-map-explorer 'build/assets/*.js'
scripts.electron: yarn build:preload && cross-env ELECTRON_IS_DEV=1 yarn electron:before && cross-env ELECTRON_IS_DEV=1 electron .
scripts.electron:start: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn electron"
scripts.electron:start:no-delete-data: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn electron:no-delete-data"
scripts.electron:build:linux: yarn build && yarn build:preload && electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -l
scripts.electron:build:windows: yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -w
scripts.electron:build:mac: yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -m
scripts.electron:build:mac:arm64: cross-env SEEDIT_BUILD_ARCH=arm64 yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -m --arm64
scripts.electron:build:mac:x64: cross-env SEEDIT_BUILD_ARCH=x64 yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -m --x64
scripts.electron:build:windows:arm64: cross-env SEEDIT_BUILD_ARCH=arm64 yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -w --arm64
scripts.electron:build:windows:x64: cross-env SEEDIT_BUILD_ARCH=x64 yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -w --x64
scripts.electron:build:linux:arm64: cross-env SEEDIT_BUILD_ARCH=arm64 yarn build && yarn build:preload && electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -l --arm64
scripts.electron:build:linux:x64: cross-env SEEDIT_BUILD_ARCH=x64 yarn build && yarn build:preload && electron-rebuild && electron-builder build --publish never -l --x64
scripts.electron:before: yarn electron-rebuild && yarn electron:before:download-ipfs && yarn electron:before:delete-data
scripts.android:build: yarn build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
